==Useful Info==
'''Centaur warriors''' fight using the same tactics as standard [[centaur (monster)|centaurs]], but are an order of magnitude more dangerous. They have enough HP to take a few hits, and can easily deal over 30 damage per shot. They can be found in the mid-late [[Dungeon]] (usually accompanied by lesser centaurs) and [[the Vaults]] (in large packs of warriors).

As an enemy with the [[:Category:Archer flag|archer flag]], centaurs warriors deal up to 13 extra damage with ranged weapons.

==Tips & Tricks==
*They're gruesome at range, so lure them into melee to remove their biggest advantage. Take advantage of corners, [[confuse]] them, or use other tricks to make this less suicidal.
*[[Repulsion]] can be a lifesaver for fragile characters here, if you have it.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.27]], centaur warriors did not have a kick attack in melee. 
:Unlike regular centaurs, their ranged damage wasn't reduced between versions. So due to the removal of monster weapon penalties in 0.27, centaur warriors became more dangerous.
